associatecertificate.name: AssociateCertificate
associatecertificate.description: Grants permission to associate an AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) Amazon Resource Name (ARN) with AWS Elemental MediaConvert

canceljob.name: CancelJob
canceljob.description: Grants permission to cancel an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job that is waiting in queue

createjob.name: CreateJob
createjob.description: Grants permission to create and submit an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job

createjobtemplate.name: CreateJobTemplate
createjobtemplate.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom job template

createpreset.name: CreatePreset
createpreset.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom output preset

createqueue.name: CreateQueue
createqueue.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue

deletejobtemplate.name: DeleteJobTemplate
deletejobtemplate.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom job template

deletepolicy.name: DeletePolicy
deletepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert policy

deletepreset.name: DeletePreset
deletepreset.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom output preset

deletequeue.name: DeleteQueue
deletequeue.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue

describeendpoints.name: DescribeEndpoints
describeendpoints.description: Grants permission to subscribe to the AWS Elemental MediaConvert service, by sending a request for an account-specific endpoint. All transcoding requests must be sent to the endpoint that the service returns

disassociatecertificate.name: DisassociateCertificate
disassociatecertificate.description: Grants permission to remove an association between the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) certificate and an AWS Elemental MediaConvert resource

getjob.name: GetJob
getjob.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job

getjobtemplate.name: GetJobTemplate
getjobtemplate.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job template

getpolicy.name: GetPolicy
getpolicy.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert policy

getpreset.name: GetPreset
getpreset.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert output preset

getqueue.name: GetQueue
getqueue.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue

listjobtemplates.name: ListJobTemplates
listjobtemplates.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert job templates

listjobs.name: ListJobs
listjobs.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert jobs

listpresets.name: ListPresets
listpresets.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert output presets

listqueues.name: ListQueues
listqueues.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queues

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to retrieve the tags for a MediaConvert queue, preset, or job template

listversions.name: ListVersions
listversions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert job engine versions

probe.name: Probe
probe.description: Grants permission to probe a file

putpolicy.name: PutPolicy
putpolicy.description: Grants permission to put an AWS Elemental MediaConvert policy

searchjobs.name: SearchJobs
searchjobs.description: Grants permission to search AWS Elemental MediaConvert jobs

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a MediaConvert queue, preset, or job template

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a MediaConvert queue, preset, or job template

updatejobtemplate.name: UpdateJobTemplate
updatejobtemplate.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom job template

updatepreset.name: UpdatePreset
updatepreset.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom output preset

updatequeue.name: UpdateQueue
updatequeue.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue
